description: Mobile techniques used by ZergHelper, ATT&CK software S0287 v1.1
name: ZergHelper (S0287)

techniques.comment: ZergHelper apparently evaded Apple's app review process by performing different behaviors for users from different physical locations (e.g. performing differently for users in China versus outside of China), which could have bypassed the review process depending on the country from which it was performed.[1]
ZergHelper abuses enterprises certificate and personal certificates to sign and distribute apps.[1]
ZergHelper attempts to extend its capabilities via dynamic updating of its code.[1]
